title: Gadha Krishna Leons
text: I am a Ph.D. Scholar in Cancer Genetics at AIIMS, New Delhi, working at the intersection of molecular genetics and bioinformatics.

title: Gadha Krishna Leons
text:
Research Focus
My research investigates the molecular landscape of B-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (B-ALL). I specialize in identifying predictive biomarkers and novel fusions in BCR::ABL1-negative B-ALL to drive personalized medicine approaches.

title: Gadha Krishna Leons
text:
Current Work

Genomic Profiling: Investigating genetic subtypes and fusions in B-ALL using RNA-Seq and functional assays.
Drug Targets: Studying predictive and prognostic molecular aberrations to improve patient outcomes.

title: Publications
text:

Gupta, S. K., & Leons, G. K. (2025). “Molecular Diagnostics”. In Manual of Hematology (pp. 158-169). [cite_start]Jaypee Brothers Medical Publishers.
Gupta, S. K., & Leons, G. K. (2025). “Diagnosis of Ph-like B-ALL: The Ideal Approach in the Indian Setting”. In Recent Advances in Hematology-5 (pp. 92-103). Jaypee Brothers Medical Publishers.
